name: Capoeira Class
description:
Capoeira is a martial art/game/dance/cultural tradition that was born in Brazil amidst the encounter of many African cultures in the forced diaspora. It us a body/energy/spiritual practice suitable for anyone =) It's also very playful

Here's a video with two great living master of this art (from the "Angola tradition") playing together:

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=NzHk9tOp9V8
